subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Adam Jones went 4 for 4 to help Baltimore move within a half-game of the A.L. East by winning the first game of two on Monday against the Blue Jays.
snippet: Adam Jones went 4 for 4 to help Baltimore move within a half-game of the A.L. East by winning the first game of two on Monday against the Blue Jays.
